p: The World Health Organization has declared coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) as a pandemic on March 11, 2020. The virus is termed severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) and responsible for outbreak of intense respiratory illness named coronavirus disease (Covid-19) ( Yuen et al., 2020). This infection first appeared in Wuhan, China, and then spread all over the world and reached all continents and almost all countries ( Muniyappa and Gubbi, 2020).
